name: Rencounter (itch)
description:
Rencounter is turn-based Role Paying Game with time-based mechanic.

Visit an ancient temple, inhabited by great evil.
Fight and become stronger with every battle. Collect rare loot from the defeated enemies.
Combine different weapons and pieces of armour to create a perfect set for your play stile.
Use tricks and strategic thinking on the battlefield to achieve victory even in the most desperate and reckless situations.
Become a truly great warrior and defeat anyone on your way.

Features:
* Unique game mechanics and graphics.
* Boss battles.
* Alternative "Chaos" game mode for those, who are ready for real challenges.
* Multiple endings.
* A perfect game for all RPG and Strategy fans!
